name: Kurrenci Virtuemart Payment Method
short_description:
Kurrenci for Virtuemart 2.0. Take payments from your customers via Kurrenci without your customers leaving your website.

Kurrenci offers the only way to accept money online that is completely free!

As a virtual currency with real value combined with our patented rates mechanism, Kurrenci is the most efficient way to acquire and retain customers.

Contact a Kurrenci representative to obtain your merchant account credentials at integration@kurrenci.com.

Supports Joomla versions 1.5.x-3.x.x.
Supports Virtuemart 2.0.xx.

Please install both Kurrenci and KurrenciViews plugins supplied in the archive. Once installed - activate them in Plug-in Manager. Once activated - add Kurrenci Payment Method and configure your merchant credentials in Virtuemart.

At this point you are done and can now accept payments with Kurrenci.

Only supports U.S. Dollar currency.
